page.title: 14PLANTS AND FLOWERS
page.content: We went up to the naze to find and study plants.Around the Naze Tower we found a variety of plants.The stonecrop we actually found growing on the tower.We also found it had a very distinct taste of pepper.We discovered that there were many different types of grasses.There were small flowers that were a member of the sweet pea family.A very pretty one was the scarlet pimpernel that we found under a gorse bush along with a woody nightshade which is poisonous.We also found very common ones like daisy and buttercup.
